spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: K'Tulah is a 4th-level spellcaster. K'Tulah's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). K'Tulah has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Feline Agility
entries: When K'Tulah moves on her turn in combat, she can double her speed until the end of the turn. Once she uses this ability, K'Tulah can't use it again until she moves 0 feet on one of her turns.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit ({@hit 4} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.
